amendment.description: An amendment numbered 88 printed in Part B of House Report 118-602 to ensure States and other cooperating entities that provide search and rescue services on Federal lands can receive reimbursement.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Stauber amendment (A049) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Stauber amendment (A049) Agreed to by voice vote.
